Title: Sofia-SIP: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Sofia-SIP, the worst of which can lead to remote code execution.

Background.Text: Sofia-SIP is an RFC3261 compliant SIP User-Agent library.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Sofia-SIP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Sofia-SIP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: Gentoo has discontinued support for the Sofia-SIP package. We recommend that users unmerge it:
